x_nuvo_diag_probes.description:
There was a Customization to the Nuvolo Mobile App Config record (x_nuvo_mobile_app_config) for the Space Reservation UI Page. nav_to.do?uri=%2Fx_nuvo_mobile_app_config.do%3Fsys_id%3D5adbd5a5db1014104fe9567b4b9619e8
That record was missing the Reference to the New Keys/Messages included as part of the upgrade to the Sweden Release. So, that record didn't include a Reference to the new Translation Keys/Messages (sys_ui_message) records. Which caused Errors when trying to load into the Sweden Version of the Reservations UI Page.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Check for missing Key/Message reference
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation:
Temporary Work Around Update the Space Reservation's Mobile App Config record's Translation field to include a Ref to the "missing" Tranlation Records. Nav to Reservation UI Page, inspect page, view Console, see error messages referencing "keys" For each Key, nav to Mobile App Config record, update Tranlations field to include said key.
Permanant fix Recommend reverting the Space Reservation's Mobile App Config record back to OOTB, when upgrading the higher instances.

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_97c6e61f1bf62d1088b2777e0a4bcbf1
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>There was a Customization to the Nuvolo Mobile App Config record (x_nuvo_mobile_app_config) for the Space Reservation UI Page.
nav_to.do?uri=%2Fx_nuvo_mobile_app_config.do%3Fsys_id%3D5adbd5a5db1014104fe9567b4b9619e8

That record was missing the Reference to the New Keys/Messages included as part of the upgrade to the Sweden Release.
So, that record didn't include a Reference to the new Translation Keys/Messages (sys_ui_message) records.
Which caused Errors when trying to load into the Sweden Version of the Reservations UI Page.</description><healthcheck_type/><name>Check for missing Key/Message reference</name><order/><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation>Temporary Work Around
Update the Space Reservation's Mobile App Config record's Translation field to include a Ref to the "missing" Tranlation Records.
Nav to Reservation UI Page, inspect page, view Console, see error messages referencing "keys"
For each Key, nav to Mobile App Config record, update Tranlations field to include said key. 

Permanant fix
Recommend reverting the Space Reservation's Mobile App Config record back to OOTB, when upgrading the higher instances.</remediation><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();

var gr = new GlideRecord('x_nuvo_mobile_app_config');
gr.addEncodedQuery('GOTOname=Space Reservation'); 
gr.query();

var xFound = false;
var yFound = false;
var zFound = false;

var specificKeys = [' SFM_RESERVATION_SCHEDULE_VIEW_TOOLTIP', ' SFM_RESERVATION_MAP_VIEW_TOOLTIP', ' SFM_RESERVATION_CARD_VIEW_TOOLTIP'];

if(gr.next())
{
	//grabs the translations field
	var tF = gr.getDisplayValue('translations');
	//splits it into a list of keys
	var keys = tF.split(',');

	for(var i = 0; i < keys.length; i++)
	{
		var key = keys[i].toString();
		switch(key)
		{
			case specificKeys[0]:
				xFound = true;
				break;
			case specificKeys[1]:
				yFound = true;
				break;
			case specificKeys[2]:
				zFound = true;
				break;

			default:
			break;
		}
	}
}

if(xFound == false)
	util.handleOutput('Space Reservation in the App Config is missing the "SFM_RESERVATION_SCHEDULE_VIEW_TOOLTIP" key. Make sure to add it to the list.','Warning','Reservation');

if(yFound == false)
	util.handleOutput('Space Reservation in the App Config is missing the "SFM_RESERVATION_MAP_VIEW_TOOLTIP" key. Make sure to add it to the list.','Warning','Reservation');

if(zFound == false)
	util.handleOutput('Space Reservation in the App Config is missing the "SFM_RESERVATION_CARD_VIEW_TOOLTIP" key. Make sure to add it to the list.','Warning','Reservation');]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>pierson.arnold@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-05-19 19:31:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>97c6e61f1bf62d1088b2777e0a4bcbf1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>61</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Check for missing Key/Message reference</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_97c6e61f1bf62d1088b2777e0a4bcbf1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:26</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
